ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:1}); // {Aeris}
This isthe Temple of the Ancients{PAUSE}II know
I feel it
The knowledge of the Ancientsfloating

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:2}); // {Aeris}
You could become one with the Planet,
but you're stopping it
with the strength of will.{PAUSE}For the future?
For us?

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:5}); // Because I'm here?
I'm sorryI don't understand.

showWindowWithDialog({window:3, dialog:6}); // {Aeris}
I want to go inside!

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:11}); // {Barret}
It says number 9.
He has a tattoo on his neck.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:10}); // {Tifa}
Number 9.
Another man with a tattoo.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:12}); // {Red XIII}
He's number 9.
There's a tattoo.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:15}); // {Cid}
Hey, he's got a tattoo.
It says number 9.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:14}); // {Yuffie}
He has a tattoo too!
Ummm, I think it's number 9.

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:13}); // {Cait Sith}
Oh!?
It's a number 9 tattoo.
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:0, g:160, b:40, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});
fade({r:160, g:160, b:160, speed:64, type:6, adjust:0});
fade({r:160, g:160, b:160, speed:16, type:5, adjust:255});

dialogStrings:
{Aeris}
This isthe Temple of the Ancients{PAUSE}II know
I feel it
The knowledge of the Ancientsfloating

{Aeris}
You could become one with the Planet,
but you're stopping it
with the strength of will.{PAUSE}For the future?
For us?

{Cloud}
What are you saying?
Do you understand?

Because I'm here?
I'm sorryI don't understand.

{Barret}
It says number 9.
He has a tattoo on his neck.

{Yuffie}
He has a tattoo too!
Ummm, I think it's number 9.

{Cid}
Hey, he's got a tattoo.
It says number 9.
